metadata.title: CVE-2014-5512 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
ntopng: Several vulnerabilities fixed upstream in 1.2.1

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5512` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntopng - 1.2.1+dfsg1-1.1
ntopng-data - 1.2.1+dfsg1-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ntopng package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.1+dfsg1-1.1').
